reviews.sentence: Satisfied customer. We spent a night in a the Superior King suite 3rd floor and it was spacious contemporary quiet private and clean. We really enjoyed the comfy bed and updated bathroom. The hotel as a whole was open and comfortable friendly staff ok breakfast. It is right off a big street but at night it is quiet. The underground parking was also a plus keeping the car cool away from the burning sun.

no water from shower. The hotel is new clean and love the fact that it has free parking. but the shower head basically has no water. instead of taking a 5min shower. it took me 30 mins to get enough water to wash off the soap and shampoo. when I tell the front desk all she said is I will look into it. I think the rooms are renovated but the building is older so there is a problem with the water pressure.

Interesting and a little pricey. No microwave has refrigerator and individual Kureig. Sleep number bed. Limited tv channels. Breakfast is extra. Parking and wifi are good. Needed to stay near the stadium so it worked ok. Had to rent a car because no shuttle service.

A Domain Hotel stay December 2016. The Domain Hotel is a great and reliable hotel with pleasant staff hapy to help. Anything broken in the rooms gets fixed fast and with a smile. The in room coffee maker is much appreciated by this early riser as is the WiFi desk and chair. Breakfast starts early another plus for me and both the food and staff are good. Parklng is plentiful the rooms are quiet and provide a good nights sleep. The bathrooms are well equipped and everything works as it should. Just up the road in walking distance are several restaurants and I use the Fish Market a lot. The location on El Camino Real is fine too. I had recommend this hotel to any business user needing a Sunyvale location.

Good. Room was very nice and comfortable. Good parking ready to find staff was helpful. Had problems with the temperature in the shower. could not get it to stick to a constant temperature sometimes just pure hot water sometimes just cold.

Really modern upscale feel that is still fun. The room was very comfortable and the separate living room with king size sleep number bed is great. Friendly staff and free parking WiFi is nice. Definitely recommend this place if you can get a decent rate.

I would highly recommend the Domain Hotel if you are staying in the Silicon Valley area. The hotel was clean rooms were fantastic. Close to Sunyvale Mountainview Palo Alto etc. Plus there is free parking which was nice.

Domain Hotel April 2017. Overall this hotel wants to be presented as a better facility but it reveals that the remodeling was done fast and cheap. Do not settle for the rooms that are facing the inside court as they are extremely noisy from 5 am till 11 pm at night. Breakfast is very good free parking is a plus.

Comfortable place to stay. The domain is located along el Camino real highway 92in Sunyvale. Close to the exit of Laurence Expressway connection to 101 and 280 east west. As they claim only 7 miles away from everything which is true. Rooms in the hotel are clean and comfortable. First time I had a bed to could be adjusted tot the customers sleeping preference Ie the sturdiness of the mattress. Breakfast buffet was good though no variety each day the same stuff. Hotel provides free WiFi fruit and water coffee at the reception. Also underground parking available.

FELT LIKE AN OFFICE. Priceless good room was cleanAnd I have no complaints there. But it felt like I was sleeping inside someones office. And walking into the hotel felt like walking into a mall for a T Mobile store. Our room was on the ground floor so it was very noisy. Above us and there was quite a ruckus outside in the parking lot do not know if it was the same group but I did not sleep very well all night.
hairs on bed. extra charge for parking. did nor help with change of dates.

Business Traveler. This is a chic modern boutique type hotel and was perfectly suitable for my 2night stay while on business in the South Bay. It was not until I was checking out that I was asked if I had a car I did. and I was then told they waived parking. This was a nice gesture even if accidental since no one asked about a car when I checked in. Charging for parking is pretty lame there is nothing there that puts a demand on the parking situation. But it is also the Silicon Valley and they can get away with it I suppose. I can not lower the rating on this point since I did not pay for parking but it is still surprising they charge for this. On the upside I had a little balcony and could sit outside it is centrally located it is clean I had a pretty good dinner meal in the small bar there are snacks for purchase off the lobby the lobby is very comfy the wireless is free and they have sleep number beds. I really could not have needed much else.
Excellent. Clean great location friendly staff. Basic parking expensive ice machine broken hotel expensive.

The rooms are really clean and the service is awesome. I spoke to Stephanie P at the front desk and she was super sweet. She made me feel valuable and went above and beyond to make sure I had a great stay. She even gave me a great tip about one of the hotel aps so that I could get an even better deal on my room rental. Thanks Domain Hotel. Shout out to Sam at the front desk she is always great ever time I stay at the Domain hotel and also Jef and Thomas at Bytes bar. ❤ ️ Priscila.

Clean and comfortable for a family of 4. Easy check in clean nice gym and pool. Close to a Starbucks. Nice breakfast75 dollar charge for a pet to stay it was defiantly over priced. I ’ve never paid more than 40. Also I feel parking should be included they charge 12 per night.

Run Down with a paint job on a gross road. It ’s on a “ strip mall ” road. next to a KFC etc. The lobby is done for looks but the AC was noisy the vent in the bathroom was a racket they had a “ wine dispenser ” in the room empty. We had a parking nightmare because there was some “ make money fast ” seminar in the lobby. It ’s not as nice as the pictures the rooms are about 1970s level. Oh and that pool. Right next to the road.

Very convenient location and competitively priced. This is a very attractive and conveniently located hotel with plenty of nearby restaurant choices. The rooms are clean modern and very comfortable. One of our group had a Sleep Number bed and appreciated the ability to change the beds characteristics. There was a modest fee for parking a car. The rooms were competitively priced. Great place to stay.

So so. Decent hotel. Rooms were reasonable and hotel design was nice for the price. Friendly staff. I have a few gripesComplete lack of soundproofing. I heard everything around me and the guy upstairs woke me up early every day It was overpriced and they wanted to up sell everything. 12 for parking which is n’t common in this area. 13 for a bad breakfast that was never stocked well and missing items most days. I prefer it when a hotel includes breakfast but if they charge for it then I expect something decentBathrom and sink tended to get clogedIt was n’t bad. I would n’t hesitate to stay here again but getting rid of the parking charge and including breakfast would help a lot. It just was n’t good enough to give it more than a so so review.
Definitely dated and worn. did not like that it was not free parking. Was never offered info for the supposed free WiFi.
